mapper.insert: INSERT INTO eigen_value_one ( id, create_time, wave_id, pulse_speed, pulse_area, heart_rate, start_value, start_index, end_value, end_index, center_value, center_index, down_center_value, down_center_index, area, single_wave_length ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createTime}, #{waveId}, #{pulseSpeed}, #{pulseArea}, #{heartRate}, #{startValue}, #{startIndex}, #{endValue}, #{endIndex}, #{centerValue}, #{centerIndex}, #{downcenterValue}, #{downcenterIndex}, #{area}, #{singleWaveLength} )

INSERT INTO eigen_value_two ( id, eigenvalueone_id, width, single_length, speed, aone_value, aone_index, atwo_value, atwo_index, athr_value, athr_index, bone_value, bone_index, btwo_value, btwo_index, bthr_value, bthr_index, cone_value, cone_index, ctwo_value ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{eigenValueOneId}, #{width}, #{singleLength}, #{speed}, #{aoneValue}, #{aoneIndex}, #{atwoValue}, #{atwoIndex}, #{athrValue}, #{athrIndex}, #{boneValue}, #{boneIndex}, #{btwoValue}, #{btwoIndex}, #{bthrValue}, #{bthrIndex}, #{coneValue}, #{coneIndex}, #{ctwoValue} )

INSERT INTO eigen_value_three ( id, eigenvalueone_id, pulse_interval, peresistance, ctwo_index, aone_shallow_up, aone_shallow_dwon, aone_center_up, aone_center_dwon, aone_deep_up, aone_deep_dwon, atwo_shallow_up, atwo_shallow_dwon, atwo_center_up, atwo_center_dwon, atwo_deep_up, atwo_deep_dwon, athr_shallow_up, athrShallowDwon, athr_center_up, athr_center_dwon ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{eigenValueOneId}, #{pulseInterval}, #{peresistance}, #{ctwoIndex}, #{aoneShallowUp}, #{aoneShallowDwon}, #{aoneCenterUp}, #{aoneCenterDwon}, #{aoneDeepUp}, #{aoneDeepDwon}, #{atwoShallowUp}, #{atwoShallowDwon}, #{atwoCenterUp}, #{atwoCenterDwon}, #{atwoDeepUp}, #{atwoDeepDwon}, #{athrShallowUp}, #{athrShallowDwon}, #{athrCenterUp}, #{athrCenterDwon} )

INSERT INTO eigen_value_four ( id, eigenvalueone_id, stroke_volume, rise_time, fall_time, athr_deep_up, athr_deep_dwon, bone_shallow_up, bone_shallow_dwon, bone_center_up, bone_center_dwon, bone_deep_up, bone_deep_dwon, btwo_shallow_up, btwo_shallow_dwon, btwo_center_up, btwo_center_dwon, btwo_deep_up, btwo_deep_dwon, bthr_shallow_up, bthr_shallow_dwon, bthr_center_up ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{eigenValueOneId}, #{strokeVolume}, #{riseTime}, #{fallTime}, #{athrDeepUp}, #{athrDeepDwon}, #{boneShallowUp}, #{boneShallowDwon}, #{boneCenterUp}, #{boneCenterDwon}, #{boneDeepUp}, #{boneDeepDwon}, #{btwoShallowUp}, #{btwoShallowDwon}, #{btwoCenterUp}, #{btwoCenterDwon}, #{btwoDeepUp}, #{btwoDeepDwon}, #{bthrShallowUp}, #{bthrShallowDwon}, #{bthrCenterUp} )

INSERT INTO eigen_value_five ( id, eigenvalueone_id, bthr_center_dwon, bthr_deep_up, bthr_deep_dwon, cone_shallow_up, cone_shallow_dwon, cone_center_up, cone_center_dwon, cone_deep_up, cone_deep_dwon, ctwo_shallow_up, ctwo_shallow_dwon, ctwo_center_up, ctwo_center_dwon, ctwo_deep_up, ctwo_deep_dwon, average_press ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{eigenValueOneId}, #{bthrCenterDwon}, #{bthrDeepUp}, #{bthrDeepDwon}, #{coneShallowUp}, #{coneShallowDwon}, #{coneCenterUp}, #{coneCenterDwon}, #{coneDeepUp}, #{coneDeepDwon}, #{ctwoShallowUp}, #{ctwoShallowDwon}, #{ctwoCenterUp}, #{ctwoCenterDwon}, #{ctwoDeepUp}, #{ctwoDeepDwon}, #{averagePress} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, create_time as createTime, wave_id as waveId, pulse_speed as pulseSpeed, pulse_area as pulseArea, heart_rate as heartRate, start_value as startValue, start_index as startIndex, end_value as endValue, end_index as endIndex, center_value as centerValue, center_index as centerIndex, down_center_value as downcenterValue, down_center_index as downcenterIndex, area, single_wave_length as singleWaveLength FROM eigen_value_one where wave_id = #{waveId}

SELECT id, eigenvalueone_id as eigenValueOneId, width, single_length as singleLength, speed, aone_value as aoneValue, aone_index as aoneIndex, atwo_value as atwoValue, atwo_index as atwoIndex, athr_value as athrValue, athr_index as athrIndex, bone_value as boneValue, bone_index as boneIndex, btwo_value as btwoValue, btwo_index as btwoIndex, bthr_value as bthrValue, bthr_index as bthrIndex, cone_value as coneValue, cone_index as coneIndex, ctwo_value as ctwoValue FROM eigen_value_two where eigenvalueone_id = #{eigenValueOneId}

SELECT id, eigenvalueone_id as eigenValueOneId, pulse_interval as pulseInterval, peresistance as peresistance, ctwo_index as ctwoIndex, aone_shallow_up as aoneShallowUp, aone_shallow_dwon as aoneShallowDwon, aone_center_up as aoneCenterUp, aone_center_dwon as aoneCenterDwon, aone_deep_up as aoneDeepUp, aone_deep_dwon as aoneDeepDwon, atwo_shallow_up as atwoShallowUp, atwo_shallow_dwon as atwoShallowDwon, atwo_center_up as atwoCenterUp, atwo_center_dwon as atwoCenterDwon, atwo_deep_up as atwoDeepUp, atwo_deep_dwon as atwoDeepDwon, athr_shallow_up as athrShallowUp, athrShallowDwon as athrShallowDwon, athr_center_up as athrCenterUp, athr_center_dwon as athrCenterDwon FROM eigen_value_three where eigenvalueone_id = #{eigenValueOneId}

SELECT id, eigenvalueone_id as eigenValueOneId, stroke_volume as strokeVolume, rise_time as riseTime, fall_time as fallTime, athr_deep_up as athrDeepUp, athr_deep_dwon as athrDeepDwon, bone_shallow_up as boneShallowUp, bone_shallow_dwon as boneShallowDwon, bone_center_up as boneCenterUp, bone_center_dwon as boneCenterDwon, bone_deep_up as boneDeepUp, bone_deep_dwon as boneDeepDwon, btwo_shallow_up as btwoShallowUp, btwo_shallow_dwon as btwoShallowDwon, btwo_center_up as btwoCenterUp, btwo_center_dwon as btwoCenterDwon, btwo_deep_up as btwoDeepUp, btwo_deep_dwon as btwoDeepDwon, bthr_shallow_up as bthrShallowUp, bthr_shallow_dwon as bthrShallowDwon, bthr_center_up as bthrCenterUp FROM eigen_value_four where eigenvalueone_id = #{eigenValueOneId}

SELECT id, eigenvalueone_id as eigenValueOneId, bthr_center_dwon as bthrCenterDwon, bthr_deep_up as bthrDeepUp, bthr_deep_dwon as bthrDeepDwon, cone_shallow_up as coneShallowUp, cone_shallow_dwon as coneShallowDwon, cone_center_up as coneCenterUp, cone_center_dwon as coneCenterDwon, cone_deep_up as coneDeepUp, cone_deep_dwon as coneDeepDwon, ctwo_shallow_up as ctwoShallowUp, ctwo_shallow_dwon as ctwoShallowDwon, ctwo_center_up as ctwoCenterUp, ctwo_center_dwon as ctwoCenterDwon, ctwo_deep_up as ctwoDeepUp, ctwo_deep_dwon as ctwoDeepDwon, average_press as averagePress FROM eigen_value_five where eigenvalueone_id = #{eigenValueOneId}
